events.name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Overview of the materials, supply chains, challenges, and federal actions related to electric vehicle batteries.
events.description: Overview of the materials, supply chains, challenges, and federal actions related to electric vehicle batteries.

events.name: Transition Minerals
events.wd_description: Five key minerals—lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, and graphite—are essential for EV batteries, with demand expected to rise.
events.description: Five key minerals—lithium, nickel, cobalt, manganese, and graphite—are essential for EV batteries, with demand expected to rise.

events.name: Supply Chain Challenges
events.wd_description: Issues include low domestic supply, concentration of reserves outside the U.S., and the need for foreign processing.
events.description: Issues include low domestic supply, concentration of reserves outside the U.S., and the need for foreign processing.

events.name: Domestic Supply Issues
events.wd_description: Low domestic supply of EV battery minerals and recycled materials for battery manufacturing.
events.description: Low domestic supply of EV battery minerals and recycled materials for battery manufacturing.

events.name: Foreign Processing Needs
events.wd_description: Even mined minerals in the U.S. require foreign processing, affecting the supply chain efficiency.
events.description: Even mined minerals in the U.S. require foreign processing, affecting the supply chain efficiency.

events.name: Geopolitical Risks
events.wd_description: Shifting extraction to the U.S. could reduce geopolitical risks and improve safety standards.
events.description: Shifting extraction to the U.S. could reduce geopolitical risks and improve safety standards.

events.name: Environmental Policy Issues
events.wd_description: U.S. NEPA processes and outdated mining laws affect extraction prioritization, water monitoring, and waste management.
events.description: U.S. NEPA processes and outdated mining laws affect extraction prioritization, water monitoring, and waste management.

events.name: Federal Government Actions
events.wd_description: Current federal government actions aimed at addressing supply chain challenges and promoting a net-zero economy.
events.description: Current federal government actions aimed at addressing supply chain challenges and promoting a net-zero economy.

events.name: Technological Improvements
events.wd_description: Material substitution, improved battery chemistries, and advanced manufacturing processes to reduce mineral demand and impact.
events.description: Material substitution, improved battery chemistries, and advanced manufacturing processes to reduce mineral demand and impact.

events.name: Material Substitution
events.wd_description: Using alternative materials that are more abundant and less impactful.
events.description: Using alternative materials that are more abundant and less impactful.

events.name: Battery Chemistries
events.wd_description: Developing battery chemistries that provide the same energy storage with less mineral input.
events.description: Developing battery chemistries that provide the same energy storage with less mineral input.

events.name: Manufacturing Processes
events.wd_description: Advanced processes to improve material efficiencies during battery production.
events.description: Advanced processes to improve material efficiencies during battery production.

events.name: Battery Reuse
events.wd_description: Reusing old batteries to extend their lifecycle and reduce waste.
events.description: Reusing old batteries to extend their lifecycle and reduce waste.

events.name: Recycling Processes
events.wd_description: Implementing processes to recycle batteries and recover valuable materials.
events.description: Implementing processes to recycle batteries and recover valuable materials.

events.name: Supply Chain Policies
events.wd_description: Federal policies to address challenges in the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Federal policies to address challenges in the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Net-Zero Initiatives
events.wd_description: Initiatives aimed at reducing emissions and achieving a net-zero economy.
events.description: Initiatives aimed at reducing emissions and achieving a net-zero economy.

events.name: NEPA Processes
events.wd_description: National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) processes affecting mining operations.
events.description: National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) processes affecting mining operations.

events.name: Mining Laws
events.wd_description: Outdated mining laws prioritize extraction over other land uses.
events.description: Outdated mining laws prioritize extraction over other land uses.

events.name: Water Monitoring
events.wd_description: Inadequate monitoring of water use and contamination in mining operations.
events.description: Inadequate monitoring of water use and contamination in mining operations.

events.name: Waste Management
events.wd_description: Poor management of mining waste and tailings.
events.description: Poor management of mining waste and tailings.

events.name: Mineral Reserves Concentration
events.wd_description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States, affecting domestic supply.
events.description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States, affecting domestic supply.

events.name: Recycled Materials Shortage
events.wd_description: There is a shortage of recycled materials available for battery manufacturing in the U.S.
events.description: There is a shortage of recycled materials available for battery manufacturing in the U.S.

events.name: Mineral Refining
events.wd_description: The refining of extracted minerals is concentrated in a small number of countries outside the U.S.
events.description: The refining of extracted minerals is concentrated in a small number of countries outside the U.S.

events.name: Battery Cell Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Battery cell manufacturing processes are concentrated in a few countries, affecting supply chain efficiency.
events.description: Battery cell manufacturing processes are concentrated in a few countries, affecting supply chain efficiency.

events.name: Extraction Shifting
events.wd_description: Shifting mineral extraction to the U.S. could reduce geopolitical risks associated with supply chains.
events.description: Shifting mineral extraction to the U.S. could reduce geopolitical risks associated with supply chains.

events.name: Safety Standards
events.wd_description: U.S. mining operations could potentially offer better safety standards for workers compared to other countries.
events.description: U.S. mining operations could potentially offer better safety standards for workers compared to other countries.

events.name: Health Protections
events.wd_description: Improved health protections for workers in U.S. mining operations compared to other countries.
events.description: Improved health protections for workers in U.S. mining operations compared to other countries.

events.name: Environmental Assessments
events.wd_description: NEPA processes include environmental assessments to evaluate mining impacts.
events.description: NEPA processes include environmental assessments to evaluate mining impacts.

events.name: Public Participation
events.wd_description: Public participation is a component of NEPA processes but can be insufficient in mining projects.
events.description: Public participation is a component of NEPA processes but can be insufficient in mining projects.

events.name: Land-Use Prioritization
events.wd_description: U.S. mining laws prioritize mineral extraction over other land uses.
events.description: U.S. mining laws prioritize mineral extraction over other land uses.

events.name: Legal Reforms
events.wd_description: Reforms are needed to update mining laws to balance extraction with environmental and community impacts.
events.description: Reforms are needed to update mining laws to balance extraction with environmental and community impacts.

events.name: Water Use
events.wd_description: Monitoring water use in mining operations is currently inadequate.
events.description: Monitoring water use in mining operations is currently inadequate.

events.name: Contamination Monitoring
events.wd_description: Monitoring contamination from mining operations lacks independent verification.
events.description: Monitoring contamination from mining operations lacks independent verification.

events.name: Waste Management Practices
events.wd_description: Current practices for managing mining waste are insufficient.
events.description: Current practices for managing mining waste are insufficient.

events.name: Tailings Management
events.wd_description: Poor management of tailings from mining operations poses environmental risks.
events.description: Poor management of tailings from mining operations poses environmental risks.

events.name: Lithium
events.wd_description: Lithium is a key mineral used in EV batteries, with significant reserves located outside the U.S.
events.description: Lithium is a key mineral used in EV batteries, with significant reserves located outside the U.S.

events.name: Nickel
events.wd_description: Nickel is essential for EV batteries and faces similar supply and processing challenges as lithium.
events.description: Nickel is essential for EV batteries and faces similar supply and processing challenges as lithium.

events.name: Cobalt
events.wd_description: Cobalt, often sourced from the Democratic Republic of Congo, is critical for EV batteries.
events.description: Cobalt, often sourced from the Democratic Republic of Congo, is critical for EV batteries.

events.name: Manganese
events.wd_description: Manganese is used in many EV batteries, and its supply chain faces similar challenges to other transition minerals.
events.description: Manganese is used in many EV batteries, and its supply chain faces similar challenges to other transition minerals.

events.name: Graphite
events.wd_description: Graphite is crucial for EV batteries, with significant supply chain and processing issues.
events.description: Graphite is crucial for EV batteries, with significant supply chain and processing issues.

events.name: Other Critical Minerals
events.wd_description: A handful of other critical minerals are necessary for EV batteries and the transition to a zero-emission vehicle economy.
events.description: A handful of other critical minerals are necessary for EV batteries and the transition to a zero-emission vehicle economy.

events.name: Rare Earth Elements
events.wd_description: Rare earth elements are part of the transition minerals essential for the ZEV economy.
events.description: Rare earth elements are part of the transition minerals essential for the ZEV economy.

events.name: Lithium Reserves
events.wd_description: 50% of global lithium reserves are located in Chile, affecting the global supply chain.
events.description: 50% of global lithium reserves are located in Chile, affecting the global supply chain.

events.name: Cobalt Reserves
events.wd_description: 50% of global cobalt reserves are in the Democratic Republic of Congo, impacting the global supply chain.
events.description: 50% of global cobalt reserves are in the Democratic Republic of Congo, impacting the global supply chain.

events.name: Alternative Materials
events.wd_description: Development of alternative materials to replace critical minerals in EV batteries.
events.description: Development of alternative materials to replace critical minerals in EV batteries.

events.name: Abundant Materials
events.wd_description: Using materials that are more abundant and less environmentally impactful for battery production.
events.description: Using materials that are more abundant and less environmentally impactful for battery production.

events.name: Technological Improvements
events.wd_description: Technological advancements that reduce the demand for critical minerals in EV batteries.
events.description: Technological advancements that reduce the demand for critical minerals in EV batteries.

events.name: Reusing Batteries
events.wd_description: Reusing old batteries to minimize the need for newly mined materials.
events.description: Reusing old batteries to minimize the need for newly mined materials.

events.name: Recycling Batteries
events.wd_description: Recycling old batteries to recover and reuse materials, contributing to a circular economy.
events.description: Recycling old batteries to recover and reuse materials, contributing to a circular economy.

events.name: Net-Zero Economy
events.wd_description: Pushing for a net-zero economy to avoid the worst impacts of the climate crisis.
events.description: Pushing for a net-zero economy to avoid the worst impacts of the climate crisis.

events.name: Community Protection
events.wd_description: Protecting communities that are most affected by climate change impacts.
events.description: Protecting communities that are most affected by climate change impacts.

events.name: Reducing Environmental Impact
events.wd_description: Implementing strategies to reduce the environmental impact of mining and battery production.
events.description: Implementing strategies to reduce the environmental impact of mining and battery production.

events.name: Regulatory Improvements
events.wd_description: Updating regulations to ensure better environmental and community protections during mining and battery production.
events.description: Updating regulations to ensure better environmental and community protections during mining and battery production.

events.name: Monitoring and Compliance
events.wd_description: Enhancing monitoring and compliance mechanisms for environmental standards in mining and battery production.
events.description: Enhancing monitoring and compliance mechanisms for environmental standards in mining and battery production.

events.name: Copper
events.description: Copper is one of the non-critical but essential minerals required for electric vehicle batteries and the broader transition to a zero-emission vehicle economy.

events.name: Concentration Outside US
events.description: A significant portion of transition mineral reserves, including 50% of global lithium and cobalt reserves, are concentrated in countries like Chile and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Midstream supply chain activities such as mineral refining and battery cell manufacturing are also predominantly located outside the U.S.

events.name: Advanced Manufactoring Processes
events.description: Advanced manufacturing processes can improve material efficiencies during battery production, thereby reducing the input requirements for EV battery manufacturing.

events.name: Circular Economy
events.description: Implementing a circular economy involves reusing and recycling old batteries to minimize the need for newly mined materials, contributing to material efficiency and sustainability.
